verses.verse: All the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> traveled <S%H5265><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin, <S%H5512><s%> by their journeys, <S%H4550><s%> according to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s commandment, <S%H6310><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Rephidim; <S%H7508><s%> but there was no water <S%H4325><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%> to drink. <S%H8354><s%>

Therefore the people <S%H5971><s%> quarreled <S%H7378><s%> with Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Give <S%H5414><s%> us water <S%H4325><s%> to drink. <S%H8354><s%>" Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H7378><s%> "Why do you quarrel with me? <S%H5254><s%> Why do you test Yahweh? <S%H3068><s%>"

The people <S%H5971><s%> were thirsty <S%H6770><s%> for water <S%H4325><s%> there; <S%H5971><s%> and the people murmured <S%H3885><s%> against Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Why have you brought <S%H5927><s%> us up out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> us, <S%H1121><s%> our children, and our livestock <S%H4735><s%> with thirst? <S%H6772><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "What shall I do <S%H6213><s%> with these people? <S%H5971><s%> They are almost <S%H4592><s%> ready to stone me. <S%H5619><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Walk on <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with you, <S%H3947><s%> and take the rod <S%H4294><s%> in your hand <S%H3027><s%> with which you struck <S%H5221><s%> the Nile, <S%H2975><s%> and go. <S%H1980><s%>

Behold, <S%H5975><s%> I will stand before <S%H6440><s%> you there on the rock <S%H6697><s%> in Horeb. <S%H2722><s%> You shall strike <S%H5221><s%> the rock, <S%H6697><s%> and water <S%H4325><s%> will come <S%H3318><s%> out of it, <S%H5971><s%> that the people may drink. <S%H8354><s%>" Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

He called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> Massah, <S%H4532><s%> and Meribah, <S%H4809><s%> because the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> quarreled, <S%H7379><s%> and because they tested <S%H5254><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Is <S%H3426><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> among us, <S%H7130><s%> or not?"
Then Amalek <S%H6002><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> with Israel <S%H3478><s%> in Rephidim. <S%H7508><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "Choose <S%H977><s%> men <S%H582><s%> for us, <S%H977><s%> and go out, fight <S%H3898><s%> with Amalek. <S%H6002><s%> Tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> I will stand <S%H5324><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of the hill <S%H1389><s%> with God <S%H430><s%>'s rod <S%H4294><s%> in my hand. <S%H3027><s%>"

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> had told <S%H559><s%> him, <S%H3898><s%> and fought with Amalek; <S%H6002><s%> and Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and Hur <S%H2354><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of the hill. <S%H1389><s%>

It happened, <S%H4872><s%> when Moses held up <S%H7311><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> that Israel <S%H3478><s%> prevailed; <S%H1396><s%> and when he let down <S%H5117><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> Amalek <S%H6002><s%> prevailed. <S%H1396><s%>

But Moses <S%H4872><s%>' hands <S%H3027><s%> were heavy; <S%H3515><s%> and they took <S%H3947><s%> a stone, <S%H68><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> it under him, <S%H3427><s%> and he sat on it. <S%H175><s%> Aaron and Hur <S%H2354><s%> held up <S%H8551><s%> his hands, <S%H3027><s%> the one on the one side, <S%H259><s%> and the other on the other side. <S%H259><s%> His hands <S%H3027><s%> were steady <S%H530><s%> until <S%H935><s%> sunset. <S%H8121><s%>
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> defeated <S%H2522><s%> Amalek <S%H6002><s%> and his people <S%H5971><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Write <S%H3789><s%> this for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> in a book, <S%H5612><s%> and rehearse <S%H7760><s%> it in the ears <S%H241><s%> of Joshua: <S%H3091><s%> that I will utterly <S%H4229><s%> blot out <S%H4229><s%> the memory <S%H2143><s%> of Amalek <S%H6002><s%> from under the sky. <S%H8064><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar, <S%H4196><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> its name <S%H8034><s%> Yahweh our Banner. <S%H3071><s%>

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Yah <S%H3050><s%> has sworn: <S%H3027><s%> <S%H3050><s%> 'Yahweh will have war <S%H4421><s%> with Amalek <S%H6002><s%> from generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation. <S%H1755><s%>'"
